name: Orbital Defense Program - Demo
description:
Orbital Defense Program is a tower defense/management game with roguelike elements.

You play as the Commander of the ODP, and your objective is to protect the earth against an alien invasion, by allocating resources to upgrade the functions of the ODP, making strategic decisions and executing some actions in real time. The main means of defense is the Orbital Cannon, which fires automatically at aliens. 

The game is not complete yet. This demo version has:

  • 15 waves.
  • 4 alien ship types
  • 10 Unique events
  • 8 available modules
  • 10 available upgrades

The composition of the waves, number of aliens and some of the events are randomised for each run. In the future I plan to add even more variety of options, in order to make each run a different experience.

The controls are simple. Mouse clicks for almost all interactions with the game.

Shortcuts:

  • The Q W E keys (on QWERTY keyboard) for executing Real Time actions
  • Space key for finalizing orders 
  • Esc key for pausing

It is recommended to use the  Full-screen button at bottom right for a better experience.

If you liked the game, you can follow me on Itch for updates, or follow my Twitter : https://twitter.com/cyreneGames
